definition: to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: Starts to play hide-and-seek with the soul, perhaps chase.
sentences.chinese: 开始和心灵捉迷藏，或是追逐。

sentences.english: We can't play basketball today, but we can play hide-and-seek instead.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们不能打篮球了，但是我们可以改玩捉迷藏。

sentences.english: Fish in the grass shrimp darting hide and seek, playing the lost.
sentences.chinese: 小鱼小虾就在这草里钻来钻去捉迷藏，玩的迷了路。

sentences.english: There among that dusty disorder, would you care to play hide - and - seek ?
sentences.chinese: 灰尘铺满零乱的书斋，歌儿呵，你可愿在那里捉迷藏？

sentences.english: They can also play skip rope and hide-and-seek.
sentences.chinese: 孩子还可以玩跳绳和捉迷藏。

sentences.english: My little brother always slithers underneath the car in the garage when we play hide and seek.
sentences.chinese: 我与小弟玩捉迷藏时，他总是爬到车库的车子底下。
三个小土豆正在捉迷藏。

sentences.english: We're gonna play hide-and-seek now, okay?
sentences.chinese: 我们现在要玩捉迷藏，好吗？

sentences.english: Remember playing "hide and seek" when you were a kid?
sentences.chinese: 还记得小时候玩的“捉迷藏”吗？

sentences.english: Small handkerchief, four square, a veil, hide and seek.
sentences.chinese: 小手绢，四方方，蒙上脸，捉迷藏。

sentences.english: There are some children playing hide-and-seek on the play ground.
sentences.chinese: 有几个孩子们正在操场上玩捉迷藏。
我们经常在一起捉迷藏。

sentences.english: He often ganged his pupils to play hide-and-seek.
sentences.chinese: 他经常将学生分成伙玩捉迷藏游戏。

sentences.english: I remember that I always played this game with Elina, my next door neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 我记得小的时候经常和我的邻居Elina玩捉迷藏。

sentences.english: Don't mind Ludo, he's playing hard to get.
sentences.chinese: 别介意卢多，他在玩儿捉迷藏呢。
古牧最喜欢地游戏是捉迷藏。

definition: to play rubber band jump rope
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
to play (as children do)/to amuse oneself
to play/to have fun/to hang out
